My idea was to make the perfect bass synth for my needs. Many other synths sound great and does exactly what i want, but they also often do alot more than that. WAY MORE! So i decided to back it down a bit and create a compact monophonic synth with a lot of control over phase and the generated waveforms. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s retrig on all oscÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s and that combined with the various elements regarding waveform modulation, opens up for more fun in creating new sounds fast.

The gui and everything else are work in progress.

/Marcus Bits
